title: Body of Evidence (1993) Madonna (DVDrip)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106453/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106453/</a>

Madonna screws and old millionaire to his death, and is accused of having murdered him for his money. Really original court drama, if you can bear with all the sex scenes. One of Madonna's rare full-length feature films.

This is not my rip, I found it on the net using Piratebay's tracker, so I thought it should be represented here.

Widescreen 576x304, good stereo.
Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.
